Name: Kandra The Moonwalker
About the game: Kandra: The Moonwalker is a 3D platformer demo inspired by the great classics of Nintendo 64 and PlayStation like Spyro or Banjo Kazooie. In Kandra's universe the other Moonwalkers have disappeared and with them the magic has diseppeared. Kandra 's goal as one of the last remaining Moonwalkers is to find her friends and recover the magic feathers. Find collectibles! Collect feathers , gems and other collectibles to unlock abilities, open portals and progress towards your goal: collecting all the magic feathers and returning magic to the world. Defeat enemies and bosses! Fight against enemies that want to block your waym, from mere minions to bosses . Use different skills for different combat situations. Get new skills for Kandra! Unlock new skills to face enemies in new ways and overcome environmental challenges . Explore the different worlds and bring back the magic! Explore worlds, help their inhabitants , beat the bad guys and collect gems and feathers to restore order. Do you want to learn to create videogames like Kandra the Moonwalker? Use our link to access our free course and create your first 3D game in Unity today -2018-parte1?coupon=unaranagratis
